From Armando Iannucci (The Thick of It) comes a look into American politics, revolving around former Senator Selina Meyer (Julia Louis-Dreyfus) who finds being Vice President of the United States is nothing like she expected and everything everyone ever warned her about. 8.3 <<<<<<< HEAD 37 ======= 33 >>>>>>> 63a2c908009d8c5b86301c78fa0d8daee9faabf7 30 80395 Veep Continuing 2011-03-07 05:38:06 322581 graphical/237831-g2.jpg <<<<<<< HEAD fanart/original/237831-9.jpg 1434920379 posters/237831-5.jpg ======= fanart/original/237831-5.jpg 1415012592 posters/237831-2.jpg >>>>>>> 63a2c908009d8c5b86301c78fa0d8daee9faabf7 1 EP01518570

Selina decides to make the Clean Jobs Commission a pet project, but a series of missteps requires her staff to work damage control.

tt3682530 en At the party convention, Selina and her staff scramble against the clock to avert a major internal crisis. Amy grows increasingly infuriated with the president’s new advisor, Karen, who is coaching a nervous Catherine on her First Daughter speech to the convention. Back in D.C., Dan recruits Jonah and Richard to pose as influential Washington insiders.

Chris Addison 2 Storms and Pancakes 6 2015-05-17
tt3682522 en On the campaign trail, Selina is annoyed by press reaction to her running mate’s effortless charm and decides to attend a pancake-brunch fundraiser without any of her team on hand to help. When news arrives that a major hurricane is about to hit North Carolina, it looks like it could be good news for her image. In D.C., Amy tries to adjust to her new post-White House life, and Jonah gets bizarrely ambushed at what he thinks is a job interview.

Becky Martin 2 Mommy Meyer 7 2015-05-24
tt3682526 en A dramatic incident in the White House leaves the president shaken, while at a Q&A, Tom James speaks out and makes her day even worse. As Mike tries to sell the press on Selina’s Families First bill, Sue and Gary prepare for the president’s White House dinner with old friends. Jonah and Richard inadvertently reveal a terrible secret, while Dan and Amy find themselves at a lobbying event for the concrete industry.

tt3682538 en With the Families First Bill growing increasingly toxic, Gary sets up a clandestine meeting with Dan and Amy to persuade them to lobby against it. Meanwhile, Selina attempts to keep working while ill in bed with the flu. As the vote on Families First draws near, her staff works to ensure the deciding vote will go in their favor, as it becomes clear that victory or defeat lies in the hands of just one congressman.
